error_code_description: Patients that have a missing or incorrectly formatted date of birth.
Patients that do not have a (correctly formatted) gender variable.
Patients that were dropped as they do not have a (correctly formatted) date of diagnosis or date of onset.
Patients that have a missing or incorrectly formatted date, and that were defaulted to 1700-01-01.
Patients that have incorrect or incomplete data in (one of) their mri record(s).
Patients that were dropped as they are not found in the Disease History table and therefore do not have a date of diagnosis or date of onset.
